title: Zombie darake no Kono Sekai dewa Sex shinai to Ikinokorenai
original_name: ゾンビだらけのこの世界ではセックスしないと生き残れない
sinopse:
The world has been brought to a near-apocalyptic state by a mysterious virus that turns people into zombies. But thankfully we’ve found the only method to keep the zombies at bay, and that is… having sex… welcome to this new survival love-action adventure!!

(Source: MU)
